WndProperty.Name: prpTaskPoint
WndProperty.Caption: Task Point
WndProperty.Help: This sets the task point for review.

WndProperty.Name: prpRange
WndProperty.Caption: Range
WndProperty.Help: For AAT tasks, this setting can be used to adjust the target points within the AAT sectors. Larger values move the target points to produce larger task distances, smaller values move the target points to produce smaller task distances.

WndProperty.Name: prpRadial
WndProperty.Caption: Radial
WndProperty.Help: For AAT tasks, this setting can be used to adjust the target points within the AAT sectors. Positive values rotate the range line clockwise, negative values rotate the range line counterclockwise.

WndProperty.Name: prpAATTargetLocked
WndProperty.Caption: Target locked
WndProperty.Help: When enabled, targets placed within the AAT area are not adjusted automatically.
